en.content: The call is that of a coyote, common in this area. The sound can be frightening, particularly at night, but coyotes have learned to avoid humans. You can proceed without fear.

text.content: You may check-mark the small box beside the Natural World skill.

zh.content: 那是郊狼的嗥叫，在这个地区很常见。狼嗥听上去很吓人，尤其是晚上的时候，但郊狼懂得躲避人类。你可以毫无惧色地前进。

text.content: 你可以在「博物学」技能左边的小方框里打勾。
